knimeNode.name: Biehman Deconvolution
knimeNode.shortDescription: Performs Biehman deconvolution on a collection of peak profiles.

fullDescription.intro: Performs deconvolution using a Bieman approach. The local maxima of a mass trace is perceived and, after background correction and noise estimation, deconvoluted by scanning the perceived maxima forwards and backwards for local minima.
fullDescription.option: A window used to perceive peaks from one local minimum to another [number of scans].
A factor by which the background noise estimation is multiplied. Peak perception terminates when intensity signals fall below the resulting threshold.
Whether profiles should be re-centerd using a three-point parabola. The actual data points are moved in this case.
